message: I'm excited to introduce you to this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth every penny, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $2000000, which is a fair and competitive price considering its exceptional features and benefits.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe this is a reasonable price considering its value.

I understand you're interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to make an offer. However, considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than your initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1800000. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value.

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. I understand your desire to get the price lower, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1700000, which is a compromise between our previous offers. This is the best I can do, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1650000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1725000, which is a compromise between our previous offers. I'm not willing to go any lower than this, so I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1700000, which is a fair price considering the product's value.

I'm starting to feel that we're at an impasse, Bob. I'm willing to make one last compromise. I'll meet you at $1750000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I've put into this negotiation. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider other options.
